TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UIImageResizingMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration of values that specify how a ought to be resized.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIImageResizingMode Stretch = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The contents of the original image are scaled to fill the interior of the new image.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIImageResizingMode Tile = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The contents of the original image are repeated as necessary to fill the interior of the new image.
